data.description: Allah has knowledge of everything, including all events past, present, and future.
Allah has written everything that will happen in a preserved tablet called Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz.

data.category: Allah's will and creation of everything
data.description: Allah has willed and created everything that exists, including human beings and their actions.
While everything is predestined by Allah, humans still have free will and are responsible for their actions, and will be held accountable for them on the Day of Judgment.
